Row.Text: The birth of a Great Revolutionary has granted you the ability to choose an Ideology for your civilization![NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Note: This may take until the next turn.[ENDCOLOR]
A Great Revolutionary has been born in {1_Desc}!

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]This slot is empty. Fill this slot by expending a Great Philosopher. Great Philosophers can be earned by completing Social Policy Trees or adopting Lv. 3 Ideological Tenets.[ENDCOLOR]

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]This slot is filled. You can replace the Policy in this slot by expending a Great Philosopher. Great Philosophers can be earned by completing Social Policy Trees or adopting Level 3 Ideological Tenets.[ENDCOLOR]
